title: Elon Musk restores account of conspiracy theorist Alex Jones on X
description: The move to reinstate Alex Jones on X is likely to hasten the flight of advertisers from the site over antisemitism and hateful content.

title: How a toilet-themed YouTube series became the biggest thing online
description: The short-form video series on YouTube chronicles the battle between the Skibidi Toilets — toilets with human heads —  and people who have CCTV cameras, speakers and televisions for heads.

title: Why Tesla Autopilot shouldn’t be used in as many places as you think
description: Experts say drivers often don’t read user manuals, leaving many unaware of Autopilot’s limitations. We read Tesla’s, as well as investigations and lawsuits, to see where Autopilot is meant to be used.

title: Tesla drivers run Autopilot where it’s not intended — with deadly consequences
description: A Post analysis reveals that people have died or been gravely injured in crashes where Tesla’s software should not have been enabled in the first place.
